review_title: Some very intelligent people here, very poor leadership, contribution to the countries of the Americas is limited.
pros: Some very bright minds and dedicated individuals. Colleagues are warm and interesting, coming from all countries of Central and Latin America, and some from the Caribbean. Interesting work in Vaccines, non-communicable disease, sustainable development, emergency response, and other areas.
cons: Very slow to move. Entrepreuneurship and Creativity are discouraged. Morale is low. Leadership is not respected.

review_title: Technical Officer, Management of Noncommunicable Diseases
pros: Good team environment, engaging and fast paced environment, ability to contribute to development agenda via management of noncommunicable diseases work plan.
cons: Poor stability and long term commitment to staff. Due to changing commitments from donors, it may sometimes be difficult to plan long term for your contract.
